item.description:
We haven't been here in a while - I actually looked through the old meetups (and almost gave up!) and it's been well over two years. It's a very nice restaurant, and we would like to give members from other parts of the state an easier ride. 

The building can be found at the intersection of Main & Washington Streets, but the entrance to the parking lot and restaurant is in the back, on Melilli Plaza. If memory serves, the first 2 hours of parking are free. Mikado is located in the basement level of the building. Very cozy!

http://mikado.m988.com/

Last time we had a large group and reserved the "party room"; perhaps if we have a large enough group (at least 10) we can do that again. It was more like a private booth with curtains, but it was pretty cool.

Hope to see you there!

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Back to Mikado!
